file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
security:
  - jwtBearer: []
info:
  title: Schul-Cloud LDAP-Config Service API
  description:
    This is the API specification for the Schul-Cloud LDAP-Config service.
  contact:
    name: support
    email: info@hpi-schul-cloud.de
  license:
    name: GPL-3.0
    url: 'https://github.com/hpi-schul-cloud/schulcloud-server/blob/master/LICENSE'
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: /ldap-config/
components:
  parameters:
    id:
      name: _id
      required: true
      description: database id of a system config object
      in: path
      schema:
        pattern: '^[0-9a-f]{24}$'
    verifyOnly:
      name: verifyOnly
      description: run only verification without saving the data (default = false)
      in: query
      schema:
        type: boolean
    activate:
      name: activate
      description: value to set as system.ldapConfig.active (default = true)
      in: query
      schema:
        type: boolean
  schemas:
    dn:
      type: string
      pattern: ^(?:[A-Za-z][\w-]*|\d+(?:\.\d+)*)=(?:#(?:[\dA-Fa-f]{2})+|(?:[^,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[\dA-Fa-f]{2})*|"(?:[^\\"]|\\[,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[\dA-Fa-f]{2})*")(?:\+(?:[A-Za-z][\w-]*|\d+(?:\.\d+)*)=(?:#(?:[\dA-Fa-f]{2})+|(?:[^,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[\dA-Fa-f]{2})*|"(?:[^\\"]|\\[,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[\dA-Fa-f]{2})*"))*(?:(,|;;)(?:[A-Za-z][\w-]*|\d+(?:\.\d+)*)=(?:#(?:[\dA-Fa-f]{2})+|(?:[^,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[\dA-Fa-f]{2})*|"(?:[^\\"]|\\[,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[\dA-Fa-f]{2})*")(?:\+(?:[A-Za-z][\w-]*|\d+(?:\.\d+)*)=(?:#(?:[\dA-Fa-f]{2})+|(?:[^,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[\dA-Fa-f]{2})*|"(?:[^\\"]|\\[,=\+<>#;\\"]|\\[\dA-Fa-f]{2})*"))*)*$
    ldapUrl:
      type: string
      pattern: ^ldaps:\/\/[\w\.-]+\.[a-z]+(:\d+)?$
    emptyString:
      type: string
      pattern: ^$
paths:
  /:
    post:
      tags:
        - ldap-config
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/activate'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/verifyOnly'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: 'schemas/post.requestBody.yaml'
      responses:
        '201':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'schemas/verify.response.yaml'
        '400':
          description: the required parameters are missing
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                additionalProperties: true
        '403':
          description: the requesting user is not allowed to access this system
  '/{_id}':
    get:
      tags:
        - ldap-config
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/id'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: returns the LDAP config of the given system id
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'schemas/get.response.yaml'
        '403':
          description: the requesting user is not allowed to access this system
    patch:
      tags:
        - ldap-config
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/activate'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/verifyOnly'
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: 'schemas/patch.requestBody.yaml'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: 'schemas/verify.response.yaml'


openapi: 3.0.2
tags:
  - name: ldap-config
    description: A service to get, validate, patch, and activate LDAP configurations.

Error: parse: parse spec: paths: /{_id}: get: operation "": responses: 200: content: "application/json": schema: parse schema: reference "schemas/get.response.yaml": resolve reference "schemas/get.response.yaml": invalid schema reference "schemas/get.response.yaml"
